fsrtool.name: fsrtool_silos
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_silos` ( `itemID` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `itemName` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `corpID` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `locationID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `siloTypeID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `typeID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `quantity` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `x` double DEFAULT NULL, `y` double DEFAULT NULL, `z` double DEFAULT NULL, `pos` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `turn` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `sort` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `input` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `stack` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `emptyTime` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `alarm` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `suspect` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`itemID`), KEY `locationID` (`locationID`), KEY `typeID` (`typeID`), KEY `corpID` (`corpID`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
